author: EXM7777
text:
if you're non-technical but want the best LLM experience...

just use claude

here's why:

if you're technical -> you can go model agnostic
- play with APIs
- setup custom environments
- plug any model into your workflows

but if you just want to open a website and get great outputs... claude is the only real option right now

because it has everything built into the webapp:
- writing styles
- custom skills
- MCP connections
- projects for context
- artifacts
- code

no technical setup required... it's all easy to use and actually works

compare this to the competition:

gemini has a basic chat interface with limited customization
chatgpt has some features but nothing close to claude's depth

you CAN replicate a claude setup with third party apps but if you're a beginner who just wants it to work out of the box...

get claude -> follow their guides -> start creating & get the best outputs

that's it
